scripts.update:react: cd packages/icons-react/ && yarn update:icons $URL && yarn build && yarn build:doc
scripts.update:vue: cd packages/icons-vue/ && yarn update:icons $URL && yarn build
scripts.update:taro-h5: cd packages/icons-taro-h5/ && yarn update:icons $URL && yarn build
scripts.update:taro-mini-program: cd packages/icons-taro-mini-program/ && yarn update:icons $URL && yarn build
